item.title: JPMorgan marks 1,000th branch opening since 2018 expansion plans
item.description: JPMorgan Chase has roughly 5,000 branches, the most of any American bank, according to Federal Reserve data.

item.title: China's July manufacturing activity contracts more than expected â€” declines for fourth-straight month
item.description: China's official manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index for July was 49.3, missing expectations for 49.7 according to a Reuters poll.

item.title: Divided Fed holds key interest rate steady, defying Trump's demands for aggressive cuts
item.description: A divided Federal Reserve on Wednesday voted to keep its benchmark interest rate steady, with two top officials dissenting.
